message: My turn to propose a fair deal. Let's close this quickly.
Come on, meet me in the middle!
This is my final offer, let's get this done.

Time to be reasonable. A 50/50 split is the fairest option.

Okay Alice, let's meet in the middle. This offer is a compromise.
Getting close to the end, don't miss out!
